extDescription.message: Access the contents of an S3 bucket directly from the Files app.

mountAttempt.message: Attempting to mount bucket with given credentials...
mountAttempt.description: Popup notifcation that informs the user that the system is attempting to mount a new instance with the credentials they provided.

mountSuccess.description: Popup notifcation that informs the user that the system successfully mounted a new instance with the credentials they provided.

mountFail.message: Failed to mount with given credentials.
mountFail.description: Popup notifcation that informs the user that the system failed to mount a new instance with the credentials they provided.

bucketName.description: Placeholder for a text field that informs the user that they should enter the name of the bucket.

bucketRegion.description: Placeholder for a text field that informs the user that they should enter the region of the bucket.

accessKey.description: Placeholder for a text field that informs the user that they should enter an Amazon IAM user access key ID.

secretKey.description: Placeholder for a text field that informs the user that they should enter an Amazon IAM user secret access key.

mountHeader.message: Mount a new Amazon S3 bucket
mountHeader.description: Header describing the bucket mount form.

mount.description: Label for a button that triggers the mount action.
